Characteristics[Organism]: human cells
We enriched SUMOylated peptides from a HeLa cell line stably expressing His10-tagged SUMO-2.
Characteristics[NumberOfBiologicalReplic: Quantification was performed over 17 biological replicates, including 6 control, 3 heat shock, 3 MG-132 and 5 PR-619 replicates.
Comment[Instrument]: EASY-nLC system (Proxeon) connected to a Q-Exactive (Thermo)
Comment[GradientTime]: 2-hour LC gradients
120 minute gradient from 5% to 75% acetonitrile in 0.1% formic acid
Comment[FlowRateChromatogram]: flow rate of 250 nL per minute
Comment[Separation]: nanoscale LC-MS/MS
online nanoflow liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry
Comment[PrecursorMassTolerance]: mass tolerance of 6 ppm for precursor masses
Comment[FragmentMassTolerance]: mass tolerance of 20 ppm was used for fragment ions
Comment[NumberOfMissedCleavages]: Up to 3 missed tryptic cleavages were allowed.
Comment[EnrichmentMethod]: a first round of His10-SUMO-2 purification, a filter step to concentrate SUMO-2 conjugates while simultaneously separating SUMO-2 conjugates from free SUMO-2, digestion by Lys-C and a second round of purification followed by a trypsin digest

Comment[NumberOfMissedCleavages]: Up to 3 missed tryptic cleavages were allowed.
Comment[EnrichmentMethod]: a first round of His10-SUMO-2 purification, a filter step to concentrate SUMO-2 conjugates while simultaneously separating SUMO-2 conjugates from free SUMO-2, digestion by Lys-C and a second round of purification followed by a trypsin digest

Characteristics[Organism]: human cells
We enriched SUMOylated peptides from a HeLa cell line stably expressing His10-tagged SUMO-2.
Characteristics[NumberOfBiologicalReplic: Quantification was performed over 17 biological replicates, including 6 control, 3 heat shock, 3 MG-132 and 5 PR-619 replicates.
Comment[Instrument]: EASY-nLC system (Proxeon) connected to a Q-Exactive (Thermo)
Comment[GradientTime]: 2-hour LC gradients
120 minute gradient from 5% to 75% acetonitrile in 0.1% formic acid
Comment[FlowRateChromatogram]: flow rate of 250 nL per minute
